eligibility.notes: In-app + 7-ELEVEN COD; opened ~15h after pickup; Order is not yet completed

snadResult.label: SNAD
snadResult.reason: The seller explicitly stated the screen was replaced with a genuine Apple part. The listing and chat did not mention this, and the provided notes do not indicate a material mismatch.

primaryOption.label: Return & Full Refund
primaryOption.details: Seller reimburses NT$60 COD shipping and provides a return label.

alternativeOption.label: Partial refund & Keep Item
alternativeOption.details: Buyer keeps the item; offer 15–30% partial refund.

caseSummary:
Order: TW-10567
Eligibility: R1/R2/R3 ✅
Key: The seller explicitly stated the screen was replaced with a genuine Apple part. The listing and chat did not mention this, and the provided notes do not indicate a material mismatch.
Decision: SNAD
Outcome: The buyer will receive a full refund and return label, and the seller will ship the item back within 48 hours.
